lines.text: I'm tired of dancing with you while you screw your face out of shape for the benefit of every dame, while I go home with an old relic because I can't afford to go home without him.
I'm too good for this joint.

[to the fan dancer]
Did you ever think about doing that dance with one fan?
When you come to your senses I'll talk to you.
I've come to my senses; that's why I'm leaving.
This coal mine is gonna be a nice, peaceful place when you're gone.
You wouldn't get rich on what I'd pay you.
There are other ways to get rich.

[after a tryst with his partner]
I, uh, was just going over a new routine with my partner.
Oh, and are new routines difficult?
No, this wasn't. You see, she's danced it before.
